alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 2:07AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Columbia County, northwestern Webster and northwestern Claiborne Parishes through 300 AM CDT... At 206 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Smithland to near Sarepta. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Magnolia, Springhill, Haynesville, Cullen, Sarepta, Taylor, Emerson, Shongaloo, Bussey, Village, Smithland, Atlanta, Macedonia, Welcome, Calhoun, Ebenezer, Laughlin, Walkerville, Noxobe and Horsehead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
